lyric:
[00:00.000] 作词 : Carter Britz/aidan fuller
[00:00.150] 作曲 : Carter Britz/aidan fuller
[00:00.300]
[00:01.260]Na na na na na na, yeah
[00:03.990]Na na na na na na na na
[00:09.410]Damn, Aidan
[00:10.920]What you up to bro?
[00:12.120]What you been up to Aidan?
[00:14.560]Yeah, ya
[00:15.570]I been dancing in my room
[00:17.860]Swaying my feet
[00:19.900]Tryna give you love and a kiss on the cheek
[00:23.820]Cotton candy skies like I'm stuck in a dream
[00:27.440]And I've been feeling blue
[00:29.450]You're the one that I need
[00:31.960]Dancing in my room
[00:33.860]Swaying my feet
[00:35.880]Tryna give you love and a kiss on the cheek
[00:39.820]Cotton candy skies like I'm stuck in a dream
[00:43.830]And I've been feeling blue
[00:45.340]You're the one that I need
[00:49.240]And baby yeah you give me reasons
[00:53.280]Just to fight all of my demons
[00:57.600]Yeah I love you when you're speaking
[01:01.537]'Cause you silence all my feelings
[01:03.939]That feeling that I'm not okay
[01:05.849]And everyone will run away
[01:07.950]And lеave me in my room (room)
[01:10.090]Alone for just anothеr day
[01:11.980]I'm sippin' on some lemonade
[01:13.590]I wonder if you'll ever change
[01:15.890]**** it I don't even care
[01:17.899]Baby, just go and ride my wave
[01:19.959]Dancing in my room

[01:59.869]Cotton candy skies like I'm stuck in a dream
[02:03.849]And I've been feeling blue
[02:05.480]You're the one that I need
[02:07.340]She's a very pretty girl
[02:09.348]In a very shitty world
[02:11.459]She got records on the wall
[02:13.479]And a necklace made of pearls
[02:15.378]She's an angel to my nightmares
[02:17.788]Message to my night scares
[02:19.800]Whenever you are down
[02:21.308]Just know that I'll be right there
[02:24.028]Dancing in my room
[02:25.839]Swaying my feet
[02:27.848]Tryna give you love and a kiss on the cheek
[02:31.770]Cotton candy skies like I'm stuck in a dream
[02:35.998]And I've been feeling blue
[02:37.348]You're the one that I need

[02:47.800]Cotton candy skies like I'm stuck in a dream
[02:51.818]And I've been feeling blue

tlyric:
[00:00.300]
[00:01.260]呐呐呐呐呐呐，耶
[00:03.990]呐呐呐呐呐呐呐呐
[00:09.410]天哪，艾丹
[00:10.920]兄弟，你在干什么？
[00:12.120]你最近在忙什么呢，艾丹？
[00:14.560]是啊
[00:15.570]我在房间里跳舞
[00:17.860]摆动我的脚
[00:19.900]尝试给你爱和脸颊上的一个吻
[00:23.820]棉花糖样的天空像我被困在梦中
[00:27.440]我一直很忧郁
[00:29.450]你是我所需要的人
